idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

descript.abstract: This data set represents the location of sites within North Carolina that are regulated by the hazardous waste portions of the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA). This includes Large Quantity Generators, Small Quantity Generators, Transporters of Hazardous Waste, permitted treatment, storage or disposal (TSD) facilities and TSD facilities that are under an Order or a Consent Agreement. (Note: facilities that are Conditionally Exempt Small Quanitity Generators may also be included if they are also a Transporter or TSD facility.) The data is extracted from the EPA RCRAInfo database. The State of North Carolina, Division of Waste Management, Hazardous Waste Section is the implementer of record for this data. The Hazardous Waste Section is authorized by EPA to administer the hazardous waste program.
descript.purpose: The purpose of this data set is to provide a geographic representation of the location of all active hazardous waste sites as regulated by the NC Hazardous Waste Section. This dataset is intended for general planning and mapping purposes (rather than highly accurate analytical or public health purposes).
descript.supplinf: Where indicated, the location of the facilities is based on geocoding of address information that is submitted when a facility requests an EPA Identification number (EPA ID). The EPA ID is a location based number and it does not travel with the facility.

idinfo.useconst: None. Please check sources, scale, accuracy, currentness and other available information. Please confirm that you are using the most recent copy of both data and metadata. Acknowledgement of the Division of Waste Management would be appreciated.

enttyp.enttypd: This data depicts the known universe of facilities regulated by the Hazardous Waste Section of the Division of Waste Management

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Number that uniquely identifies the handler
The official or legal name of the handler
The street number from the location street address
The first line of the street address, route number, or other specific identifier describing the physical location of the handler
Second line of the street address (or the post office box number), route number, or other specific identifier describing the physical location of the handler
Name of the city or town in which the handler is located.
Abbreviated name of the county in which the site is located.
The ZIP code in which the handler is located.
Name (first and last) of the person who is familiar with the handler's operation and the information provided to the authorizing agency (as indicated by the SourceType).
Telephone number associated with the contact.
Indicates whether a facility is a hazardous waste generator and, if applicable, its status.
Indicates whether or not a facility is a hazardous waste transporter.
Indicates if the facility is a permitted hazardous waste treatment facility

edom.edomvd: The facility is a permitted hazardous waste treatment facility
The facility is not a permitted hazardous waste treatment facility

edom.edomvd: Facility is a permitted hazardous waste storage facility
Facility is not a permitted hazardous waste storage facility

attr.attrdef: Indicates whether or not the site is a land disposal facility

edom.edomvd: The site is a land disposal facility
The site is not a land disposal facility

attr.attrdef: Latitude coordinate of site in WGS 1984 decimal degrees
Longitude coordinate of site in WGS 1984 decimal degrees
Index referring to the methodology used to identify the location of a facility
Source for which locations were acquired
Resolution of Scale (actual or relative) of source data

overview.eaover: This published GIS dataset contains a selection of publicly useful and approved attributes extracted from the RCRAInfo database.

dataqual.logic: Tests for integrity have not been performed.
dataqual.complete: All sites regulated by the hazardous waste sections of RCRA and within North Carolina are represented as of the date of currentness

horizpa.horizpar: Refer to in-line metadata for details on location methodology for each feature. Address information and accuracy varies. However, the relative accuracies of information may be qualified as follows: The accuracy of information for the Treatment, Storage and Land Unit facilities is very high; The accuracy of information for Large Quantity Generators is high; The accuracy of information for Transporters is high; The accuracy of information for Small Quantity Generators is medium.

procstep.procdesc: Geocode data and produce X/Y GIS layer
